oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Blacklist Extension Installation
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Extensions installation must be blacklisted by default.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Block Desktop Notifications
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Sites ability for showing desktop notifications must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Check Certificate Revocation
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Online revocation checks must be done.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Block Plugin Execution By Default
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Default behavior must block webpages from automatically running plugins.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Default Search Provider
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Default search provider must be enabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set Default Search Provider Name
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The default search providers name must be set.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable 3D Graphics APIs
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: 3D Graphics APIs must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Autocomplete For Forms
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: AutoFill must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Automatic Plugin Search And Installation
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Automated installation of missing plugins must be disabled.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Chromium disable automatic plugin search and installation

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Background Processing
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Background processing must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Cleartext Passwords
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Cleartext passwords in the Password Manager must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Cloud Print Sharing
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Cloud print sharing must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firewall Traversal
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firewall traversal from remote host must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Google Data Synchronization
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Google Data Synchronization must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Incognito Mode
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Incognito mode must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Metrics Reporting
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Metrics reporting to Google must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Network Prediction
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Network prediction must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Outdated Plugins
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The running of outdated plugins must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Password Manager
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The Password Manager must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Blacklist Plugins
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Plugins must be disabled by default.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Pop-ups
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Sites ability to show pop-ups must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Javascript URL Protocol Schemas
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The URL protocol schema javascript must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Importing Saved Passwords
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Importing of saved passwords must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Search Suggestopms
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Search suggestions must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Per Session Cookies
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Session only based cookies must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Third Party Cookies
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Third party cookies must be blocked.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disallow Location Tracking
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Site tracking users location must be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Approved Plugins
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Plugins approved for use must be enabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Browser History
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Browser history must be saved.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Encrypted Searching
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The default search provider URL must be set to perform encrypted searches.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Safe Browsing
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Safe Browsing must be enabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Extension Whitelist
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Extensions that are approved for use must be whitelisted.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: HTTP Authentication
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The HTTP Authentication must be set to negotiate.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Plugins Require Authentication
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Plugins requiring authorization must ask for user permission.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Chromium Policy File Exists
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The Chromium policy file must exist and be configured correctly.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set Trusted Homepage URL
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The homepage must be set to a trusted site.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Configure Whitelisted Plugins For Use
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: URLs must be whitelisted for plugin use.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Google Chromium Browser
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The application installed on the system is the Google Chromium Browser

oval-def:extend_definition.comment: Installed OS is part of the Unix family

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Installed operating system is part of the Unix family
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The operating system installed on the system is part of the Unix OS family

oval-def:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Chromium disable automatic plugin search and installation

ind:family_test.comment: Test installed OS is part of the unix family
